resources.string:
1. IMPROVEMENT: Play speed icon now shows speed

2. FIX: Fixed translations

Version 1.3.4

1. IMPROVEMENT: Play speed icon now shows speed

2. FIX: Fixed translations

Version 1.3.2

1. FIX: Remaining time has been fixed in the player

Version 1.3.1

1. FIX: Fixed access to storage for Android 11 or above

Version 1.3.0

1. NEW: Added the remaining time to the player

2. NEW: Added setting \'Statusbar mode\'

3. NEW: Added setting \'Player background\'

4. IMPROVEMENT: Changed the animation of opening the player

5. IMPROVEMENT: Chapters list changed

6. IMPROVEMENT: Changed the animation of opening the player

7. IMPROVEMENT: Changed cover shadow color for dark theme

8. FIX: Fixed access to storage for Android 11 or above

Version 1.2.3

1. NEW: Added the ability to display icons instead of text

2. NEW: The color of the widget changes with the theme

3. IMPROVEMENT: The Edit button has been renamed to Folders

Version 1.2.2

1. IMPROVEMENT: Changed dialogs for selecting a mini player, play buttons, rewind buttons

2. FIX: Fixed cropping of album cover

3. FIX: Bug fixes, stability improvements

Version 1.2.1

1. NEW: The sound fades out slowly when the sleep timer ends

2. NEW: Added \'Shake to reset\' option to sleep timer

3. FIX: Bug fixes, stability improvements

Version 1.2.0

1. NEW: Added setting \'Volume Control\'

2. NEW: Added setting \'Cover settings\'

3. NEW: Added setting \'Play button style\'

4. NEW: Added \'Repeat\' button

5. FIX: Bug fixes, stability improvements

Version 1.1.6

1. IMPROVEMENT: Chapters list changed

2. FIX: Bug fixes, stability improvements

Version 1.1.5

1. NEW: Added \'End of current chapter\' option to the sleep timer

2. NEW: Added setting \'Use English language\'

3. NEW: Added setting \'Show dividers\'

4. NEW: Added \'More\' button

5. IMPROVEMENT: Sleep timer interface changed

6. IMPROVEMENT: Maximum playback speed increased to x4

7. IMPROVEMENT: Added translations

8. FIX: Fixed setting \'Show progress bar\'

9. FIX: Fixed changing the color of the status bar when turning on/off dark mode

10. FIX: Fixed sending support message and suggestions

Version 1.1.4

1. NEW: Added folder selection \'Folder with multiple subfolders\'

2. IMPROVEMENT: The sleep timer no longer remembers the last entered value

Version 1.1.3

1. NEW: Added the ability to mark books as current

2. NEW: Long press on a bookmark opens editing

3. IMPROVEMENT: Increased the number of displayed characters in bookmarks

4. IMPROVEMENT: Changed the progress bar, now it is round

5. IMPROVEMENT: Changed some icons

6. FIX: Translation

Version 1.1.2

1. FIX: Fixed sleep timer window

2. FIX: Fixed incorrect display of the cover in the player on some devices

3. FIX: Fixed background when choosing cover from the internet

4. IMPROVEMENT: Changed some icons

Version 1.1.1

1. NEW: Added the ability to mark books as finished or unfinished

2. NEW: Added setting \'Progress bar\'

3. IMPROVEMENT: Changed some icons

4. IMPROVEMENT: Added translations

Version 1.1.0

1. IMPROVEMENT: Added translations

2. FIX: Fixed work of setting screen orientation

Version 1.0.9

1. NEW: Added setting for changing the style of the mini player

2. NEW: Added setting for changing the style of rewind buttons

3. NEW: Added setting \'Screen orientation\'

4. NEW: Added setting for manual switching of list/grid view

5. IMPROVEMENT: Rewind step settings changed

6. FIX: Application error when finishing some books

7. FIX: Fixed display of shadows on some devices with long screen

8. FIX: Translation

9. BETA: Some settings removed

Version 1.0.8

1. IMPROVEMENT: Changed the style of icons in the widget and notification panel

2. FIX: Fixed orientation sensor

3. FIX: Translation

4. BETA: Added mini player

Version 1.0.7

1. NEW: Added display of the percentage of the progress of reading the book

2. NEW: Added the ability to delete books (or chapters) files

3. NEW: Added developer mode

4. IMPROVEMENT: Changed menu item \'About\'

5. FIX: Translation

6. BETA: Added setting showing \'Volume Control\' on the playback screen

7. BETA: Added setting \'New rewind icons\'

8. BETA: Added setting \'Portrait orientation\'

Version 1.0.6

1. NEW: For each book, added setting for displaying chapter numbering in the table of contents

2. NEW: Added colors for the status bar

3. NEW: Added the ability to change the author

4. NEW: Added \'Support and suggestions\' section to settings

5. IMPROVEMENT: Separators changed

6. IMPROVEMENT: Logo instead of blank screen when loading app

7. FIX: Fixed checkbox colors

8. FIX: Translation

Version 1.0.4 - 1.0.5

1. NEW: Added new color palettes

2. NEW: Added special thanks section

3. IMPROVEMENT: Returned the colored play/pause button

4. IMPROVEMENT: Changed settings

5. FIX: Landscape view

6. FIX: Translation

Version 1.0.3

1. NEW: Added the ability to change interface colors

2. IMPROVEMENT: Changed dialogs

3. IMPROVEMENT: Changed settings menu

4. FIX: Application error when finishing some books

5. FIX: Translation

Version 1.0.2

1. NEW: Added changelog

2. NEW: Added support for folding devices

3. IMPROVEMENT: The design of the application has been changed, the icons have become rounded

4. IMPROVEMENT: Changed the name of the bookmark created by the sleep timer

5. IMPROVEMENT: Changed the shape of the app icon for some devices

6. FIX: Bug when deleting bookmarks

Version 1.0.1

1. NEW: Added silence skipping function

2. IMPROVEMENT: After the sleep timer ended, for 30 seconds you have the chance to shake the phone to restart the playback

3. IMPROVEMENT: Dialog background changed

4. FIX: Incorrect display of the cover on some devices

5. FIX: Flac chapter parsing

6. FIX: Bug in the chapter parsing of m4b files

7. FIX: Translation

Version 1.0.0

1. NEW: Application release
